markdownRemark.html: Another weird book that made it onto my list, but this one turned out to just be weird in a bad way. The Strange Library is a very short book that makes no sense. It was a book of the month on Amazon a few months ago, but I don't know why. I do not have much to say about this book so I am not going to waste my words writing about it. I do not recommend it to anyone. I thought it was a waste of my time. Maybe for a kid it would have been okay or maybe it was just way over my head, doubtful.
